TopicTitle: We need more RO-compatible spacecraft parts! </3

Articles.Content:
For real! There's a fine amount of rocketry parts built for, or compatible with, Realism Overhaul even if you don't use FASA (which I don't, because personally I think the parts look drab). However, even thou you can build a rocket, you won't have anything to launch! The choices for good looking probes and piloted vehicle parts are EXTREMELY slim! Especially antennas X_X

I guess this is a request - does anybody think they could make some parts for payloads and orbital spacecraft? I'd be more than willing to help out as best I can! :3

I heartily second this!

You should check out this thread if you haven't, though, Raidernick has made an amazing quantity of probes.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/125397-Historical-Rockets-Probes-and-Stations
